articles.title: Don't Hoard Old Tech. CNET Survey Finds 31% of US Adults Hold Onto Unused Devices - CNET
articles.description: Only 37% of people trade in their old devices, while a quarter sell them. If old tech is cluttering your home, you're sitting on extra cash.
articles.content:
